name: Escaping From Fear
description:
You don´t remember anything ... You wake up and you don´t know where you are, and also, there is something paranormal near you!

Try to escape... alive!

An awesome short game of Horror and mistery, with an immersive original music, Click and point first person style. 
Headphone and dark room recommended... ! 
Let me know how the experience was for you.

  F E A T U R E S : 

- Click and Point First person style.
- Interactive game 
- Original and immersive music tracks
- With inventory items

  C O N T R O L :

Move the cursor and click to interact. For inventory items you have to click and drag.
